overview: Alessandro is an Economics & Finance graduate of Bocconi University; Alessandro began is career as equity sales with Euromobiliare SIM. After completing his MBA at Columbia Business School in New York, Alessandro joined Bain & Company as a consultant working in several industries and engagements. Alessandro joined dPixel in 2008 and has been promoted GP in 2010 closely following dealflow and firmsâ€™ operations. He left dPixel in 2011 to focus on his own entrepreneurial projects. Alessandro is fluent in English, enjoys riding his motorbikes and recently launched the Fondazione Lorenzo Santo for the promotion of entrepreneurship in Italy
